note:
Naturgeograf, har arbejdet med satellitkortlægning, kulturmiljø, turisme & landdistrikter. Nu AI-skeptisk gymnasielærer, bosat på Fanø, aktiv i SF lokalt.
Del af opvækket pøbel. Henfalden til sarkasme og galgenhumor.

Geographer (climate+ecology), have worked with satellite mapping, cultural environments, tourism and rural issues. Now high school teacher in Esbjerg, Denmark. Resident on Fanø island, involved in local politics (red-green).
TW: Part of the Woke Mob, AI-sceptic.
Prone to sarcasm.
